name: Alchemist Frankenbeans
desc: A man of science in a world of magic.

name: Anubis K-9
desc: The guardian of the graves, watching over all to determine those worthy of ascending to heavenly life. Can be persuaded with belly rubs.

name: Apprentice Hugo
desc: Hugo just has to be on his best behavior and not break anything for the whole week and they'll teach him how to pull a rabbit out of a hat.

name: Archon Elmer
desc: With alien technology, this destructive defender finally finds that wascally wabbit, and the Earth, within his grasp.

name: Astronaut Hector
desc: A strong attacker able to tear down enemies who are taunting and remove their positive effects!

name: Astronaut Sylvester
desc: Turns out a cat in 0G is an excellent tank, able to dodge and steal his enemies positive effects!

name: Athena Petunia
desc: The bright-eyed warrior goddess, protectress of cities and defender of the Divine. Too stubborn to let death or defeat take hold of any of her allies.

name: Barber Bugs
desc: Awesome support. Focuses on keeping his team alive by constantly healing them and clearing negative effects.

name: Barkeep Sheepdog
desc: Keep the peace with cocktails that heal allies to full or slow enemies, rousing when enemies crit.

name: Barnyard Dawg
desc: Sneaky attacker. Able to hide away from danger and unleash a strong attack on the enemies.

name: Barrelhawk Henery
desc: Lookout and Navigator of the fleet, guided only by the stars and the neverending desire to taste the so-calledchicken of the sea"."

name: Baseball Bugs
desc: Left fielder, right fielder, centerfielder, outfielder, shortstop, pitcher and catcher all at once, this Critical Attacker keeps the bases loaded.

name: Bat-Suit Wile
desc: It's not the flight suit Wile needs, but the one he deserves.

name: Bellboy Daffy
desc: This staff duck serves his Defender allies, offering amenities like Speed Up, Attack Up, and heals.

name: Bellboy Gossamer
desc: This staff monster serves his Attacker allies, offering amenities like Defense Up, Turn Meter, and Taunt.

name: Big Chungus
desc: Anything and everything.

name: Black Knight Sam
desc: The Black Knight is able to use his dragon to inflict heavy Damage Over Time on his enemies.

name: Bugs Bunny
desc: A versatile damage dealer with an AoE, selective Stun, and burst of sustain. Loves his buddy Porky Pig.

name: Bugs the Brave
desc: This heroic paladin throws himself in front of enemy attacks, becoming immune to damage when his team needs him.

name: Bushwacker Sam
desc: A true wilderness explorer, unmatched in his ability to lead his team after the most dangerous prey. Provided, of course, that his temper doesn't give his position away.

name: Caesar Leghorn
desc: Leader of the Empire, one under the Gods. His power absolute, his will divine. Not related to the salad.

name: Cannonball Coyote
desc: Wile E. has never been one to shy away from gadgets and tools, especially those of the volatile variety. This time, he's only chasing a perfect performance.

name: Cannoneer Canasta
desc: Anyone who attempts to Counter this hulking defender is getting dragged into the briny deep.

name: Captain Bligh
desc: Look at you! Consorting with Outlaws? Receiving Stat Downs? Disgrace to the Navy! Avast there, you lazy layabouts!

name: Chamberlain Porky
desc: A versatile Support serving up heals, Debuff removal, and dynamite-stuffed poultry.

name: Chauffeur Porky
desc: The fastest chauffeur in the city, able to speed up his allies and give them an edge in battle.

name: Cheerleader Wile E
desc: An athlete with a limitless supply of pep. Supports all members of the team with constant boosts and healing. Let's get that bird, team!

name: Chef Porky
desc: This hearty cook boosts his team's Max Health and heals proportionally.

name: Climber Granny
desc: A geriatric athlete with limited but relentless abilities. She's fitter than you, and knows it.

name: Concierge Elmer
desc: The graceful host of the Hotel Tasmania does his best to make the monstrous and pirate-infested island feel just like home. Mostly for the monsters and pirates.

name: Conqueror Taz
desc: Mad general of the Roman Empire. A one-man army who will not retreat or even slow down.

name: Contender Sylvester
desc: This Defender comes out strong, healing with each hit he takes and when Southpaw connects.

name: Contraptionist Egghead
desc: Don't be fooled by his size or cute monocled face. If he plans to get you, there is no running or hiding from his traps.

name: Countess Penelope
desc: Under all royalty and finesse, Countess Penelope is a skilled swordswoman ready to protect her fellow Aristocrats.

name: Cowboy Bugs
desc: Western attacker. The cowboy is excellent when fighting with desert toons.

name: Cowboy Sylvester
desc: Evasive defender. Protects his team by drawing attention to himself and rolling away from danger.

name: Cowgirl Granny
desc: Support cowgirl. Helps her team by providing a lot of critical chance and counter attack chance.

name: Cupid Elmer
desc: A hunter of hearts who leaves enemies weak-kneed and cleanses all of the past's pain.

name: Curator Porky
desc: An aggressive utility-Support who both cleanses and inflicts Stun, offering Counter Chance Up.

name: Daffy Duck
desc: A critical hit-based scoundrel who sharpens the bills of other Daffies and ignores enemy Defense. Truly dethspicable.

name: Daffy Hood
desc: Robbing the rich and giving it to himself, Daffy Hood excels at stealing buffs and finishing off weakened enemies.

name: Daffy Miranda
desc: A constant reminder that you shouldn't eat the plastic fruit.

name: Deckswab Dawg
desc: Not the most fashionable, fearsome, or powerful of the pirates you'll find across the seas. And yet, when the pirate kings have destroyed each other in their endless wars, he'll be the one left with all the treasure.

name: Desperado Dawg
desc: An infamous outlaw who hides his teammates for the perfect ambush.

name: Devil Dog
desc: Too hot to Freeze, Hector's devilish side Debuffs entire enemy teams and annihilates Heal Over Time.

name: Don Henery
desc: The capo dei capi is here to bring some order to his house of Outlaws. Keep the Don safe and there'll be something in it for you.

name: Dr. Dawgstein
desc: Great supporter. Excellent at giving critical hits to his team and healing his allies in danger.

name: Dr. Frankenbeans
desc: Never send a Monster to do the work of an evil scientist...

name: Dr. Killpatient
desc: Stunned, hm? Now that's bad! That's the first symptom of Rabbititus! Tell me, do you feel any rabbit inclinations?

name: Dread Pirate Penelope
desc: Terror of the Tasman Sea, the cute lass with the cutlass. A leader by nature and a pirate by circumstance. Wielder of the legendary Brineblade.

name: Duck Dodgers
desc: A powerful attacker who can reduce the cooldown of his special skill to deal massive amounts of damage!

name: Dunker Bugs
desc: The most playful playmaker on the court, setting up passes and prepping his team members for game-winning dunks.

name: Dunker Lola
desc: The heartthrob of the hoops. By far the most fit, energetic and committed athlete on the team. She's got something to prove, and we're here to witness it.

name: Dunker Tweety
desc: Tiny but vicious, evasive but in your face. keep your arms up because this little bird ain't playing games.

name: EGGH34D
desc: A self-taught hacker whose curiosity has landed him on the wrong side of the law. No secrets, or buffs, are safe.

name: Egghead Jr.
desc: This little polymath has a plan to protect his team from Crits and Flip anything that comes his way.

name: Egghead the Knowing
desc: Both apprentice and master, a young magician who learns all that which should remain unknown.

name: El Espectro
desc: You've heared of him, haven't you? The masked fighter from Cowgary? They say if he notices your guard its down, it's all over!

name: Elf Daffy Duck
desc: A supporter duck who can turn bad effects into good.

name: Elmer Bugs
desc: Rabbit season has taken its toll on Elmer's mental health. An interesting case study, for sure, but how do we know he's not faking it just for the pajamas and limitless carrots?

name: Elmer Fudd
desc: A hunter who pwotects his Forest friends, keeping critical hitters in check.

name: Elmer the Sure
desc: A selfish knight who becomes stronger the more he's protected.

name: Evil Granny
desc: Am ancient, or at the very least elderly, evil that assaults the Earth. How could this have happened? And how can we stop it?

name: Fair Lady Melissa
desc: This damsel in distress, once fated to marry the Grand Duke Sylvester, now fights alongside the Aristocrats buffing and supporting their counterattacks.

name: Farmer Hector
desc: Stout defender. Good against high defense defenders and cats.

name: Farmer Petunia
desc: This attacker is capable of dealing damage while protecting her allies with amazing defense boosts and healing abilities!

name: Farmer Porky
desc: Support farmer. Helps his team by healing them and weakening the enemies.

name: Fireman Bugs
desc: Bugs does his best to keep the woodlands safe and fire-free, despite what the exploding cigars would have you think.

name: Fishercat Sylvester Jr.
desc: A chipper little healer fishing for victories by buffing his team's Attack. He loves when allies gain Hidden!

name: Flamenco Prissy
desc: This fiery dancer Dodges through enemy advances and keeps her peers moving.

name: Foghorn Leghorn
desc: Strong defender. Protects his team from enemies, especially when team members are low on health.

name: Foghorn the Invincible
desc: A walking fortress who wants all the armor for himself.

name: Foreman Leghorn
desc: Now stack, I say, stack 'em high, boy! I want these walls as large and thick as your head... That's a joke, son!

name: Friar Porky
desc: This laughing tank protects his team by taking hits and healing all of his allies.

name: General Pandemonium
desc: The mean, high-ranking, high-salutin' soldier of the invading army is here to break up alliances and make sure there's no Assisting going on.

name: Gentleman Pepe
desc: A relentless playboy who knows all too well how much love can hurt.

name: Ghost of Christmas Taz
desc: Keeper of dark revelations, the warning of a future best avoided. Keep your allies close, or the cold may prove too strong.

name: Gossamer
desc: This scary tank specializes in greatly slowing down his enemies and ignoring his target's defense.

name: Gothamer
desc: Protector of the castle and owner of a lonely heart. His silence both tortures and emperors him.

name: Grand Duke Sylvester
desc: The Grand Duke is able to sniff out hidden enemies and attack them with righteous fury.

name: Grand Dukeling Sylvester Jr.
desc: Like his father he's always with a raptor in hand and en garde.

name: Granny
desc: A senior healer, able to empower her allies and weaken her enemies.

name: Gridiron Gossamer
desc: A beefy linebacker with his eyes on the prize. Once he builds momentum, good game!

name: Handmaiden Granny
desc: This healing assistant is an expert at helping her allies in battle.

name: Hector
desc: This very resistant tank steps into the front lines to defend his team even in the most adverse conditions.

name: Henery Hawk
desc: All appetite and no patience, this chicken hawk chomps through Max Health with Lifesteal against chickens.

name: Henery Hike
desc: This receiver may be small, but there's no stopping him once he's got some Speed Up under his wings.

name: Henery Horus
desc: God of the skies, carrier of the Sun and Moon. Rises above all earthly limitations, but not above the hunger for some fresh chicken.

name: Hermes Road Runner
desc: Emissary of the gods, this psychopomp is bad news for all those who oppose the divine - and moves equally as fast!

name: Hillbilly Hare
desc: Promenade across the field / Keep your allies fully healed / Keep 'em healed and keep 'em attacking / Send those enemies a-packing!

name: Hippety Hopper
desc: With Legendary strength, this boxer side-steps counters and dodge to smash non-Defender enemies with Haymakers.

name: Holiday Bugs Bunny
desc: A defender with a special knack for helping out allies and stunning opponents.

name: Hugo
desc: The Abominable Snow-Man is out searching for pet of his own, and freezing everything in his path.

name: Hunter Yosemite Sam
desc: A cantankerous critical hitter with counter chance and a hatred of rabbits.

name: Huntsman Porky
desc: This axeman cuts through Defenders while sheltering your own. Good luck staying warm with this hunter in the snow.

name: Iron Mutt
desc: Iron skin, nerves of steel and a heart of gold. When villains descend upon the world, a hero must rise.

name: Jester Bugs
desc: Only a fool would strike this prankster and his allies.

name: Joe Monday
desc: This gumshoe duck cracks cases and skulls alike with guaranteed crits, constant Counter Chance, and immunity from all Debuffs.

name: K'Chutha Sa'am
desc: A powerful tank who's able to lifesteal while taunting and deal large amounts of damage to his enemies.

name: K-9
desc: Marvin's loyal second-in-commander, ready to sniff out and mark targets, and their planets, for total annihilation.

name: K-9000
desc: Created by M4RV1N to patrol the firewalls of the metanet, this pixelated pooch uses his multiple extra appendages to Hack into enemies and Flip their Buffs with ease.

name: King Bugs Bunny
desc: The king rules at stunning his enemies and inflicting them with taunt.

name: King Daffy
desc: More monarch than mallard, this greedy attacker can't go a turn without Stealing a Buff.

name: Kitty Ketty
desc: A master of Assist, this kitty commands the battlefield through her allies, healing in urgent waves.

name: LeBron James
desc: The Captain, King James. Lethal from range and up close, with a playstyle both magnetic and malleable.

name: Leopold
desc: The maestro can protect his team and deal large amounts of damage with his gran finale.

name: Litigator Lola
desc: The City's top attorney. With quick mind and quicker tongue, no Taunt goes unchallenged.

name: Lola
desc: An irrepressible bunny babe with zero chill. Nothing this cute should do this much damage.

name: Lola Frostbane
desc: A mysterious marauder from the distant north who emboldens those who can face the Chill.

name: Lunar Petunia
desc: A force of peace in a world of mayhem. When the moon rises, so does her power.

name: Lunar Toro
desc: Embodiment of a still pond which reflects the moon flawlessly. A single ripple is enough to reveal all that lies beneath the calm surface.

name: M4RV1N
desc: A-bio-cybernetic projection tasked with protecting the metanet. You are now in his domain.

name: Mail Runner
desc: Nothing stops this mailman — not even Taunt — from delivering damage.

name: Major Canasta
desc: Predator of predators, this game hunter joins the mayhem with an empty space on his wall.

name: Martian Bugs
desc: A rabbit with an invisibility device that allows him to hide from enemy and counter attack if attacked!

name: Marvin
desc: The martian who started it all is armed to the teeth with powerful weapons.

name: Marvin Fudd
desc: The brightest laser in the woods, melting single targets from above Whenever an enemy falls, his Trigger Finger pulls.

name: Marvin the Marvelous
desc: In a time far removed from his own, Marvin is armed with groundbreaking technology and tactical knowledge. Sadly he has not figured out how to ride a horse yet.

name: Masked Avenger
desc: Awesome avenger. The Masked Avenger brings justice straight to his enemies' health, attacking quickly and decisively.

name: Master Speedy
desc: This wushu master slows and dodges enemies, keeping his allies on the righteous path.

name: Matador Bugs
desc: This crowd-pleaser baits enemies into his Taunt with timely Silences, dodging to roaring applause.

name: Merlin Sam
desc: The wizard greatly slows down his enemies and inflicts them with Damage Over Time.

name: Miss Prissy
desc: High damage critical hits. Unpredictable chick can land a critical on all attacks.

name: Monster Foghorn
desc: Lifestealer defender. Steals a lot of health from his target and jumps in front of danger to save his allies.

name: Monster Tweety
desc: A sip of Hyde Juice turned Tweety into a Debuffing, Countering menace who fears no Taunt.

name: Mountain Man Sam
desc: A cranky hermit alone for a reason. Try to cool his temper and you'll get burned.

name: Mountie Elmer
desc: A resilient tundra trooper at home in the cold who keeps his team clear of debuffs.

name: Mr. Bugs
desc: This tragic hero lives for his Supports, Assisting and boosting Defense when times are dark.

name: Mr. Sam
desc: A stout scam artist, able to protect his team and heal himself.

name: Mummy Ralph
desc: A body  without a soul, living a curse that eternally binds it to his worldly existence to seek the one who goes \"Bahhhh\".

name: Nasty Canasta
desc: This brute smashes foes with multi-hits and Damage Over Time, strengthening with each kill.

name: Ninja Ralph
desc: A skirting shadow. A bird in flight. A stealthy shinobi who will not let honor get in the way of his prize.

name: Nova Bunny
desc: In the cosmic void, all energy convenes at a single point. Those who come in contact with it are gifted with a power that is never truly under control.

name: O'Mike
desc: Being the bottom half isn't the most glamorous position, but it's an essential part of the trick. Also all that heavy lifting really strengthens your core.

name: O'Pat
desc: The mischievous chief of the leprechauns will Steal and Scramble to protect his precious pot o' gold.

name: Officer Prissy
desc: A sharp-eyed Cop who leaves the Outlaws seeing red.

name: Officer Yosemite
desc: Powerful support. Deals lots of damage and buffs his allies.

name: Outback Dawg
desc: This hunter offers teamwide Counter Chance, archetype-based Debuffs, and a handy self-heal/cleanse.

name: Outlaw Foghorn
desc: Counterattack specialist. The Mystery Man can counter attacks and stop his enemies from countering, also.

name: Outlaw Sylvester
desc: Critical supporter. Able to raise critical hits for all his team and hit taunting enemies.

name: Penelope
desc: Pursuit made this Attacker an expert at dodging - especially when afflicted with Damage Over Time. What's Taunt to a cat on the run?

name: Penelope Couture
desc: Too haute for her enemies, this sophisti-cat and her cohorts dodge advances while empowering artists.

name: Pepe Le Bard
desc: The bard uses his songs to heavily boost and heal his allies in battle.

name: Pepe Le Pew
desc: The persistent, odiferous Attacker leaves his mark with Damage Over Time. When Penelope attacks, his heart races.

name: Petunia Pig
desc: A crafty healer with a strong personality and an even stronger right hook.

name: Phantom Le Pew
desc: From the shadows this monster fixates on a single enemy, drawing strength from their sorrow.

name: Photographer Sylvester
desc: An artist whose camera slows enemies. With work this Stunning, it's no wonder he Hides from the public.

name: Picador Sylvester Jr.
desc: Every Matador needs a Picador to Silence enemies, inflict DoTs, and remove enemy Stat Ups.

name: Police Dog Hector
desc: Defensive police dog. Able to soak in a lot of damage and protect his allies while also helping them get ahead in the battle.

name: Porky Pig
desc: Balanced support swine. This friendly swine can heal his allies and dish out some damage to his enemies.

name: Presto Pig
desc: With the powers of Sham-Fu, even the silliest parlor tricks become weapons against evil.

name: Prizefighter Daffy
desc: This featherweight Defender gains Taunt with his enemies, arming Daffy teams to the bill.

name: Professor Prissy
desc: Nothing slows this explorer down, and her Speed-related buffs keep her whole team at pace.

name: QB Daffy
desc: Self-appointed captain of the team. Caller of all plays, focus of all eyes, keeper of all glory.

name: Queso Bandito
desc: This little Mouse can do fast attacks and help your team. You'll only hear the breeze, when he comes to steal your cheese!

name: Raider Lola
desc: This explorer showers enemies with debuffs via crit-capable AoEs, revealing all that's Hidden.

name: Ralph the Vampire
desc: Fast attacker. The vampire is able to sustain himself in battle while he deals large amounts of damage to his enemies.

name: Ralph Wolf
desc: High risk attacker. Uses his multipurpose kit to set up strong attacks.

name: Referee Foghorn
desc: An arbitrator who calls all the shots. Stick to his rules or he'll have you sitting this one out.

name: Reindeer Road Runner
desc: Once every year, this magical supporter travels the world, Silencing all in his wake.

name: Revenant Road Runner
desc: Here he comes to steal your soul - and deliver Crits!

name: Road Runner
desc: Fast support. Avoids enemy damage while debuffing his enemies and speeding up his team.

name: Rocket Coyote
desc: Risky, but very damaging attacker who thrives against Damage Over Time.

name: Rocket Sylvester
desc: A special support character who truly shines when accompanied by coyotes.

name: Ronin Canasta
desc: A wandering swordsman with no home or master who poisons everything of value to him.

name: Royal Page Coyote
desc: A volatile servant of the king, he's able to destabilize enemies and keep allies fighting.

name: Salesduck Daffy
desc: Multipurpose duck. This persistent duck can eat through taunt enemies with his guaranteed criticals.

name: Sam Sheepdog
desc: Big and slow, but vigilant and ready with a counter for enemies eying his flock.

name: Samurai Sheepdog
desc: Loyal guardian to the Shrine. This defender stands his ground and grows stronger from his enemies' hesitation.

name: Scarecrow Sylvester
desc: Debilitating expert. Defeats his enemies by greatly weakening them and doing health based damage.

name: Scarlet Pumpernickel
desc: The Scarlet Pumpernickel is a master swordsman who can hide from his foes and attack them with impunity.

name: Scout Foghorn
desc: A beefy scout who Taunts and Stuns enemies, buffing his buddy Scout Sylvester.

name: Scout Leader Granny
desc: A caring scout who keeps her allies on their feet, buffing the Max Health of woodland critters.

name: Scout Sylvester
desc: A sneaky scout who attacks from Hidden, buffing his buddy Scout Foghorn.

name: Scrooge Yosemite Sam
desc: An attacker who also helps his team with high risk reward effects.

name: Sea Goin' Sam
desc: This irate pirate is out looking for Bounties. With his crew of Outlaws around, there's no escaping him.

name: Settler Granny
desc: Support settler. Able to heal her allies and cleanse their wounds.

name: Sheriff Porky
desc: Support peacekeeper. The sheriff protects his allies by weakening their enemies and quickly jumping into action.

name: Shooter Coyote
desc: Some would say that science and inventiveness have no place in the realm of sport. Wile E. is here to prove that all his crafty inventiveness transfers cleanly to the court.

name: Shooter Road Runner
desc: The only player capable of occupying all positions at once. Put some bird seed by the three-point line and watch the numbers soar.

name: Shooter Taz
desc: A tornado of rubber and anger on the court. An invaluable member of the team, even if the rules aren't always so clear to him. The rulebook was delicious, however.

name: Show Biz Bugs
desc: This rabbit debuffs enemies and saves his allies from a bad performance!

name: Show Biz Daffy
desc: This duck thrives from stunning his enemies with his team's performance!

name: Siegfried Elmer
desc: Calling thunder, he's able to dish out heavy damage to all foes while standing in the front lines protecting his team.

name: Snowbunny Bugs
desc: When arctic hunters cause trouble for the wildlife, Bugs is forced to pull all the seduction stops.

name: Solid Tin Coyote
desc: An elegant hunting machine, born from scrap metal and discarded furniture. Surprisingly self-conscious, in more ways than one.

name: Space Cadet
desc: A support toon able to give his allies lots of defense and heal his tanks!

name: Space Explorer Granny
desc: Granny's invisibility cloak allows her to deal big damage while staying stealthy!

name: Speedskater Coyote
desc: Race this coyote at your own risk. His competition Freezes faster than the rink.

name: Speedy Gonzales
desc: ¡Andale! With AoE, Ignore Dodge, and extra attacks on random targets, good luck avoiding this mouse.

name: Star-Pharaoh Marvin
desc: The One True Healer comes from beyond the cosmos to Debuff false idols.

name: Starseeker Lola
desc: This deepspace explorer debuffs Hidden enemies, dodging or countering attacks.

name: Super Coyote
desc: The ACME Super Outfit pack guarantees all sorts of amazing powers. There's no guarantee, however, that they'll have your size.

name: Super-Rabbit
desc: A tamed woodland creature turned into the superdynamic rabbit of tomorrow.

name: Supersonic Hopper
desc: A destructive force let let loose upon the world, unaware of all the damage he's causing. A villain of sorts, but it's really hard to stay mad at him.

name: Sword Swallower She-Devil
desc: Nothing is too sharp, too serrated or too flame-covered to threaten her implacable gut. Frankly, she doesn't really understand what all the fuss is about, but she likes the attention.

name: Sylvester
desc: This sneaky cat can easily become hidden and lash out large amounts of damages on his enemies.

name: Sylvester Jr.
desc: This kitty follows allies into Hiding and heals the team when they emerge, popping out to Stun.

name: Sylvester Slaszlo
desc: This rebel on the run Assists from safety, scaling damage with each Defense Up on his team.

name: Sylvester the Brash
desc: A speedy cavalier who takes advantage of Defense Down to deliver devastating Critical hits.

name: Tasmanian She-Devil
desc: This surly defender Flips debuffs on her team and steals Turn Meter for tempo. Pair with Taz for max effect.

name: Taz
desc: This whirlwind Scrambles and Flips enemy buffs, enraging at low Health. Pair with She-Devil for mayhem.

name: Tazinsky
desc: True art is not always immediately coherent or beautiful. Sometimes it's confusing, sometimes it's scary. Sometimes you have to get out of its way before it eat you.

name: The Flaming Succotash
desc: A misfire of science had transformed a mild-mannered kitty into a luminary beacon of justice. This flaming feline now roams the city skies with an obligation to cook the crooks!

name: The Mighty Angelo
desc: A heavy-hitting, high-hopping circus performer with a temper nearly as short as he is.

name: The Pig Kahuna
desc: Porky has messed around with the supernatural and ended up a pawn in a far greater scheme, as he does.

name: The Rapthcallion
desc: Crystallized cosmic energy might be this trickster's meal ticket. Just as long as his son stays out of the way.

name: The Sea-Devil
desc: A creature of the deep who protects sunken ships and the treasure within. Effortless controls the tide of battle and leaves her pursuers battling the tides.

name: Tourist Daffy
desc: Daffy took a right turn at Albuquerque and now needs to Cleanse, Buff and call on Rabbit allies to Assist if he wants to survive.

name: Trapper Sylvester
desc: A sneaky hunter exploiting the cold to nab his prey. If you can't see him, he probably sees you.

name: Treasure Hunter Tweety
desc: A healer and finisher, all in one, this bird smashes foes with boulders from the safety of its team.

name: Tweety
desc: The cutest little bird you ever did taw. Why lift a feather when your allies do the work?

name: Tweety the Twue
desc: A knight banneret who keeps his team well-stocked in both defense and offense.

name: Valkyrie Bugs
desc: A support valkyrie who can greatly expedite her team's actions and silence her enemies.

name: Van Wile
desc: A well-equipped Monster hunter with nerves of steel and bullets of silver.

name: Waiter Elmer
desc: The waiter supports his team by healing and empowering his allies, especially good when fighting rabbits.

name: Western Type Hero
desc: Critical striker. Dealing high amounts of damage through his critical skills, he's able to quickly defeat his foes.

name: Wildcard Wolf
desc: Collect Buffs, deal crits, and Stun or Silence enemies who call this gambler out.

name: Wile E. Coyote
desc: This must-answer mastermind brings tricks to stifle yours, a self-healing appetite for birds, and an ever-climbing Attack stat.

name: Winter Bugs
desc: With unavoidable Chilly and overwhelming Critical effects, this attacker brings the Summit to his enemies.

name: Witch Hazel
desc: The wicked witch uses Damage Over Time to defeat those who attack her, dealing heavy damage.

name: Witch Lezah
desc: The witch supports her team by being hidden and stealing her enemies positive effects!

name: Witchdoctor Hazel
desc: In the darkest jungle, this Taunting witch inflicts DoTs, Silence all enemies, and buffs the Attack of magic allies.

name: Yeti Gossamer
desc: The blizzard itself, bringing the cold to the whole fight. Enemies Freeze while allies thaw just enough.

name: Yodel Le Pew
desc: This yodeler wears his enemies down with terrible singing, turning their strengths against them while shrugging off their critiques.

name: Yokai Taz
desc: This spirit of destruction has been summoned from realms beyond to empower Monsters with Critical Damage.

name: Yosemite Sam
desc: Selfish attacker. Deals high damage to enemies and removes attack bonuses from all characters.

name: Zombie Sam
desc: Consumed by an eternal rivalry, Sam rises from a shallow grave. It's time to clock in, after all, those sheep won't watch themselves.

name: Zoot Suit Daffy
desc: How different it was in my native village... Dodge Chance, Flip, the enemy team in Silence, their buffs removed... And then there was Stun...
